member_organisations: Ashoka does not have 'members' per-se but selects and supports over 500 social entrepreneurs in EU and 3600 globally (our Ashoka Fellows). Ashoka also mobilizes numerous partners in theuir various programs and initiatives.
fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Migration and asylum, European Neighbourhood Policy
eu_initiatives:
social enterprises, GECES, migration, employment, environment, ... 
 
H2020, DG Grow, DG Empl
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Commission expert group on social economy and social enterprises #E03576#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3576#Member#C
relevant_communication:
Ashoka (Europe) undertakes various activities to shape the ecosystem for social entrepreneurs: 
 
- Mapping of social innovation ecosystems in various EU countries https://www.ashoka.org/en/story/ashoka-mapping-changemakers-building-everyone-changemaker-societies  
 
- selection and support (financial and non-financial) of social entrepreneurs (500+ in Europe so far, 3600+ globally) 
 
- numerous programs, engaging private and public stakeholders with social entrepreneurs.  
For-example:  
Hello Europe, our migration and integration accelerator. http://www.hello-europe.eu/.  
Impact Transfer, an international infrastructure to accelerate the replication of proven social innovations 
several programs in the field of education, aiming at developing the changemaking skills of youth 
 
- numerous events, communications and publications. see www.ashoka.org and http://ashoka-cee.org/ 
 
GECES member
goals__remit:
Ashoka is a leading global network of social entrepreneurs (3500+ Ashoka Fellows) who conceive and implement system-changing solutions to solve societal issues. Our vision is to contribute to a world of ‘Everyone a Changemaker’, using our social enterprises as role models and fostering the development of changemaking skills and mindsets in all sectors. 
Ashoka Europe is active in 18 countries with 120 employees, supporting more than 550 social enterprises with numerous partners and supporters. 
In addition to identifying, selecting and supporting social entrepreneurs, Ashoka Europe is also active in developing the appropriate ecosystems for social entrepreneurship through our local offices and numerous programs and resources (Social Innovation mapping, Visionary Program, Social Investment Toolkit, Co-creation toolkit, Impact Transfer, European Migration Accelerator, Changemaker Schools, and many more).
